body_html:
I'll mark this as "contributions welcome" although be aware that there is some hassle involved:

  • We'll need a new "FixedLengthDatasetV2" op with the new option, defaulting to uncompressed.
  • For forwards compatibility, the Python wrapper will need to avoid creating a "FixedLengthDatasetV2" op for the uncompressed case for three weeks from the submission of the code.
body_text:
I'll mark this as "contributions welcome" although be aware that there is some hassle involved:

We'll need a new "FixedLengthDatasetV2" op with the new option, defaulting to uncompressed.
For forwards compatibility, the Python wrapper will need to avoid creating a "FixedLengthDatasetV2" op for the uncompressed case for three weeks from the submission of the code.
body:
I'll mark this as "contributions welcome" although be aware that there is some hassle involved:

* We'll need a new `"FixedLengthDatasetV2"` op with the new option, defaulting to uncompressed.
* For forwards compatibility, the Python wrapper will need to avoid creating a `"FixedLengthDatasetV2"` op for the uncompressed case for three weeks from the submission of the code.
